meanings.definition: Dessert or sweet dish served after the main course of a meal.
meanings.sent1: After dinner, we enjoyed delicious afters like chocolate cake.
meanings.sent2: It is common to have afters such as ice cream or fruit after a meal.
meanings.sent3: The afters were so good that we almost forgot about the main course!
meanings.sent4: The afters were a sweet symphony of flavors dancing on our taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The afters were like a delightful surprise at the end of the meal.

meanings.sent1: We will discuss the project in detail at the afters of the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The afters of the party will be a great opportunity to catch up with everyone.
meanings.sent3: Let's plan something fun for the afters to make the event memorable.
meanings.sent4: The afters of the concert turned into an impromptu jam session.
meanings.sent5: I always look forward to the afters of our gatherings for more quality time.

meanings.sent1: The afters event is scheduled for next week.
meanings.sent2: We need to prepare for the afters steps once this is completed.
meanings.sent3: The afters tasks are crucial for the success of the project.
meanings.sent4: She always plans her afters activities meticulously.
meanings.sent5: The afters phase of the plan requires careful attention to detail.
